name: whileOutput
signature: { <Out>(f: Predicate<Out>): <In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>) => Schedule<Out, In, R>; <Out, In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>, f: Predicate<Out>): Schedule<Out, In, R>; }
description:
Returns a new schedule that continues execution for as long as the given
predicate on the output evaluates to `true`.
*Details This function modifies an existing schedule so that it only continues
execution while a provided condition holds true for its output. If the
predicate returns `false`, the schedule stops.
documentation:
Returns a new schedule that continues execution for as long as the given
predicate on the output evaluates to `true`.
*Details**

This function modifies an existing schedule so that it only continues
execution while a provided condition holds true for its output. If the
predicate returns `false`, the schedule stops.
